alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 10:48PM CDT until June 23 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Foard County in northern Texas... Southwestern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1047 PM CDT, the leading edge of winds from a line of severe thunderstorms was located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Tell to near Swearingen to 11 miles west of Crowell, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crowell, Margaret, Goodlett, Copper Breaks State Park, and Lazare. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
